text: Our Lady of Limerick Catholic Church is a historic church building in Glenns Ferry, Idaho. It was built in 1915, and designed in the Gothic Revival and Romanesque Revival architectural styles. With It is "a rectangular white brick structure, gable-roofed with a front-to-back ridgebeam and a partially outset steeple/belfry/entry tower centered on the front elevation." It has been listed on the National Register of Historic Places since November 17, 1982. ==References== Category:National Register of Historic Places in Elmore County, Idaho Category:Romanesque Revival architecture in Idaho Category:Gothic Revival architecture in Idaho Category:Roman Catholic churches completed in 1915 Category:Churches on the National Register of Historic Places in Idaho
title: Our Lady of Limerick Catholic Church (Glenns Ferry, Idaho)
